{{Description|A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.}}
'''Tiny Miracle's Feather''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Tiny Miracle]].

==Description==
Plucked from a falcon that was as fast as the wind. The mere existence of such a bird is a miracle.<br>It was gifted with clear vision and sharp claws.<br>With its broad wings, its gliding speed was unparalleled.
